    • Uses of Stock in main.model

      Methods in main.model that return types with arguments of type Stock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Stock> SuperSimpleStocksModel.getStocks() 
      Methods in main.model with parameters of type Stock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean SuperSimpleStocksModel.addTrade(Stock stock, int quantity, double price, TradeType type)
      This method executes a stock trade, based upon the stock selected, the quantity of stocks, the stock price entered and the type of trade (BUY or SELL).
      double SuperSimpleStocksModel.calculateStockPrice(Stock stock)
      This method calculates the stock price based on trades made in the last 15 minutes.

    • Uses of Stock in main.model.stocks

      Subclasses of Stock in main.model.stocks 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommonStock
      A common stock differs from a preferred stock due to the fact that the dividend yield is calculated using the last dividend.
      class  PreferredStock
      A preferred stock differs from a common stock due to the fact that the dividend yield is calculated using a fixed dividend and PAR Value.
